title: Hydrogenation of cyclohexene over single-atom Pt or Pd incorporated porous ceria nanoparticles under solvent-free conditions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01432D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Amal A. Atran, Mohamed S. Hamdy
Single-atom Pt or Pd incorporated porous CeO2 nanoparticles was prepared through one-step flash-combustion technique. The prepared catalysts exhibited high activity in the hydrogenation of cyclohexene under solvent-free conditions.
